data.title: Kobe Bryant Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Kobe Bryant with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Father Joe Bryant played eight seasons in the NBA and seven in Italy before eventually becoming WNBA coach

Named after a type of steak his parents saw listed on a restaurant menu

Speaks fluent Italian, having spent eight childhood years in Italy

Took R&B singer Brandy to his high school prom

Went directly from high school to play for the Los Angeles Lakers in 1996

Became youngest All-Star in NBA history at the age of 19 in 1998

Won three straight NBA championships with the Lakers (2000-02), plus back-to-back titles (2009-10) in which he was named Finals MVP

Led the NBA in scoring 2006 and 2007 and was named league MVP in 2008

Scored 81 points, second most ever in NBA history, against Toronto in 2006

In 2006, his daughter Gianna Maria-Onoro was born six minutes before the daughter of Bryant's former teammate, Shaquille O'Neal
